glsa.title: ProFTPD: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities in ProFTPD might allow for SQL injection attacks.

background.p: ProFTPD is an advanced and very configurable FTP server.

ul.li: Percent characters in the username are not properly handled, which introduces a single quote character during variable substitution by mod_sql (CVE-2009-0542).
Some invalid, encoded multibyte characters are not properly handled in mod_sql_mysql and mod_sql_postgres when NLS support is enabled (CVE-2009-0543).

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted requests to the server, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary SQL statements.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
